TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IDataGridViewEditingControl

summary.span: 定义承载在 的单元格内的控件的常见功能。

span.span: Defines common functionality for controls that are hosted within cells of a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此接口实现由控件，如和，由对应承载单元，如和，当它们处于编辑模式。This interface is implemented by controls, such as and , that are hosted by corresponding cells, such as and , when they are in edit mode. 单元格可以托管编辑控件组的类型及其属性表示编辑控件类型。Cell types that can host editing controls set their property to a representing the editing control type. 当该单元格进入编辑模式时，将执行以下步骤：When the cell enters edit mode, the following steps are performed: 1. 控件创建编辑的控件类型的一个实例。The control creates an instance of the editing control type. 2. 控件调用该单元格方法。The control calls the cell method. 你可以重写此方法将传输到编辑控件的单元格的值。You can override this method to transfer the cell value to the editing control. 3. 控件调用编辑控件方法并传入当前单元格的样式。The control calls the editing control method and passes in the cell's current style. 你可以实现此方法以初始化编辑控件的外观，使其与匹配的单元格的外观。You can implement this method to initialize the appearance of the editing control so that it matches the appearance of the cell. 4. 控件调用编辑控件方法。The control calls the editing control method. 你可以实现此方法以进行编辑的控件，如选择控件值到最终调整。You can implement this method to make final adjustments to the editing control, such as selecting the control value. 有关实现详细信息，请参阅[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 单元格的主机控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md)。For more information about implementing , see [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md). 单元格类型，例如用于将值指定不承载编辑的控件实现情况下提供用户界面 (UI)接口。Cell types such as that provide a user interface (UI) for specifying values without hosting an editing control implement the interface. 在这种情况下，UI 将显示，无论该单元格是否处于编辑模式。The UI in this case is displayed regardless of whether the cell is in edit mode. 其他单元格类型，如，提供 UI，但不是存储用户指定的值。Other cell types, such as , provide a UI but do not store user-specified values. 在这种情况下，单元格类型不实现或承载编辑控件。In this case, the cell type does not implement or host an editing control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例提供的派生自此接口实现。The following code example provides an implementation of this interface that derives from . 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 单元格的主机控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#300](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/CS/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.cs#300)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#300](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/VB/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.vb#300)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void ApplyCellStyleToEditingControl(class System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCellStyle dataGridViewCellStyle) cil managed

span.span: The to use as the model for the UI.

summary.span: 更改控件的用户界面 (UI)，使之与指定单元格样式一致。

span.span: Changes the control's user interface (UI) to be consistent with the specified cell style.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 通常，此方法的实现会将的编辑控件，如字体、 背景色和前景色，UI 属性设置中的相应属性的值`dataGridViewCellStyle`，这是用于单元格承载的样式控件。Typically, an implementation of this method will set UI properties for the editing control, such as font, background color, and foreground color, to the values of corresponding properties in the `dataGridViewCellStyle`, which is the style used for the cell hosting the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例提供了此成员的实现。The following code example provides an implementation of this member. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 单元格的主机控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#303](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/CS/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.cs#303)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#303](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/VB/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.vb#303)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Windows::Forms::DataGridView ^ EditingControlDataGridView { System::Windows::Forms::DataGridView ^ get(); void set(System::Windows::Forms::DataGridView ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置包含单元格的 。

span.span: Gets or sets the that contains the cell.

value.span: 包含正在编辑的 的 ；如果没有关联的 ，则为 。

span.span: The that contains the that is being edited; if there is no associated .

MemberSignature.Value: public: property System::Object ^ EditingControlFormattedValue { System::Object ^ get(); void set(System::Object ^ value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置编辑器正在修改的单元格的格式化值。

span.span: Gets or sets the formatted value of the cell being modified by the editor.

value.span: 一个 ，表示单元格的格式化值。

span.span: An that represents the formatted value of the cell.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 格式化的值表示控件的用户界面中显示的值。The formatted value represents the value as it is displayed in the control's user interface. 格式化的值可能是从控件中包含的实际值中绝对值的数值和甚至数据类型不同。The formatted value may be different in absolute value and even data type from the actual value contained in the control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例提供了此成员的实现。The following code example provides an implementation of this member. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 单元格的主机控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#301](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/CS/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.cs#301)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#301](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/VB/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.vb#301)]

MemberSignature.Value: public: property int EditingControlRowIndex { int get(); void set(int value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置该承载单元格的父行的索引。

span.span: Gets or sets the index of the hosting cell's parent row.

value.span: 包含该单元格的行的索引，如果没有父行，则为 -1。

span.span: The index of the row that contains the cell, or –1 if there is no parent row.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 接口无法定义相应`ColumnIndex`属性。The interface does not define a corresponding `ColumnIndex` property. 你可以使用属性，以检索父控制和使用属性来确定的活动单元格的行和列索引。You can use the property to retrieve the parent control and use the property to determine the row and column indexes of the active cell.

MemberSignature.Value: public: property bool EditingControlValueChanged { bool get(); void set(bool value); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示编辑控件的值是否与承载单元格的值不同。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the value of the editing control differs from the value of the hosting cell.

value.span: 如果控件的值与单元格的值不同，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the value of the control differs from the cell value; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性设置为`true`以指示宿主单元格的状态已更改，并且其用户界面 (UI) 必须进行更新以反映此更改值中的。The property is set to `true` to indicate that the hosting cell's state has changed and its user interface (UI) needs to be updated to reflect this change in value. 所属的单元格或表将重置此属性设置为`false`后更新。The owning cell or table will reset this property to `false` after an update.

para.span: 返回此属性的实现中不会自动更改显示的值。

span.span: Returning in your implementation of this property does not automatically change the displayed value.

para.span: 值更改编辑控件中，必须通知通过传递更改的到方法。

span.span: When the value changes in the editing control, you must notify the of the change by passing to the method.

MemberSignature.Value: public bool EditingControlWantsInputKey (System.Windows.Forms.Keys keyData, bool dataGridViewWantsInputKey);
.method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance bool EditingControlWantsInputKey(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Keys keyData, bool dataGridViewWantsInputKey) cil managed
Public Function EditingControlWantsInputKey (keyData As Keys, dataGridViewWantsInputKey As Boolean) As Boolean

span.span: A that represents the key that was pressed.

param.name: dataGridViewWantsInputKey
param.span: 当 要处理 keyData 中的 时，为 ；否则为 。

span.span: when the wants to process the in keyData; otherwise, .

summary.span: 确定指定的键是应由编辑控件处理的常规输入键，还是应由 处理的特殊键。

span.span: Determines whether the specified key is a regular input key that the editing control should process or a special key that the should process.

returns.span: 如果指定的键是应由编辑控件处理的常规输入键，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the specified key is a regular input key that should be handled by the editing control; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 编辑控件实现此方法以确定哪些输入的键应处理由控件，并由应处理哪个输入密钥。An editing control implements this method to determine which input keys should be processed by the control, and which input keys should be processed by the . 方法由调用。The method is called by the . 将传入`true`为`dataGridViewWantsInputKey`时它可以处理`keyData`。The will pass in `true` for `dataGridViewWantsInputKey` when it can process the `keyData`. 如果编辑的控件可以让处理`keyData`，应返回`false`时`dataGridViewWantsInputKey`是`true`。If the editing control can let the handle the `keyData`, should return `false` when `dataGridViewWantsInputKey` is `true`. 其他实现可以忽略`dataGridViewWantsInputKey`值`true`并处理`keyData`编辑控件中。Other implementations of may ignore a `dataGridViewWantsInputKey` value of `true` and handle the `keyData` in the editing control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例提供了此成员的实现。The following code example provides an implementation of this member. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 单元格的主机控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#305](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/CS/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.cs#305)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#305](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/VB/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.vb#305)]

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property EditingPanelCursor As Cursor
public: property System::Windows::Forms::Cursor ^ EditingPanelCursor { System::Windows::Forms::Cursor ^ get(); };

summary.span: 获取当鼠标指针位于 上方但不位于编辑控件上方时所使用的光标。

span.span: Gets the cursor used when the mouse pointer is over the but not over the editing control.

value.span: 一个 ，表示用于编辑面板的鼠标指针。

span.span: A that represents the mouse pointer used for the editing panel.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 编辑面板是承载编辑控件时控件处于编辑模式。The editing panel is the that hosts the editing control when the control is in edit mode. 实际的编辑控件可能不包括的编辑面板的整个区域。The actual editing control may not cover the entire area of the editing panel. 在这种情况下，实现应返回要使用当鼠标指针位于面板上方但不是在该控件时的光标。In this case, the implementation should return the cursor to use when the mouse pointer is over the panel but not over the control. 通常情况下，你将想要返回该控件使用的相同光标。Typically, you will want to return the same cursor that the control uses. 如果你想要更改当鼠标指针位于控件上方时显示的光标，则必须设置属性。If you want to change the cursor that appears when the pointer is over the control, you must set the property. 可以设置此项的构造函数中实现，或者你可以将其设置实现。You can set this in the constructor of the implementation, or you can set it in the implementation. ## Examples 下面的代码示例提供了此成员的实现。The following code example provides an implementation of this member. 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供[如何： 在 Windows 窗体 DataGridView 单元格的主机控件](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md)。This example is part of a larger example available in [How to: Host Controls in Windows Forms DataGridView Cells](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-host-controls-in-windows-forms-datagridview-cells.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#311](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/CS/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.cs#311)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn#311](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewCalendarColumn/VB/datagridviewcalendarcolumn.vb#311)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance object GetEditingControlFormattedValue(valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewDataErrorContexts context) cil managed
Public Function GetEditingControlFormattedValue (context As DataGridViewDataErrorContexts) As Object

param.name: context
param.span: 值的按位组合，它指定需要数据的上下文。

span.span: A bitwise combination of values that specifies the context in which the data is needed.

summary.span: 检索单元格的格式化值。

span.span: Retrieves the formatted value of the cell.

returns.span: 一个 ，表示单元格内容的格式化版本。

span.span: An that represents the formatted version of the cell contents.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 格式化的值表示控件的用户界面中显示的值。The formatted value represents the value as it is displayed in the control's user interface. 格式化的值可能是从控件中包含的实际值中绝对值的数值和甚至数据类型不同。The formatted value may be different in absolute value and even data type from the actual value contained in the control. 若要设置控件的格式化的值，使用属性。To set the formatted value of the control, use the property.

para.span: 此方法的实现中返回的值更改不会自动更改显示的值。

span.span: Changing the return value in your implementation of this method does not automatically change the displayed value.

para.span: 值更改编辑控件中，必须通知通过传递更改的到方法。

span.span: When the value changes in the editing control, you must notify the of the change by passing to the method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void PrepareEditingControlForEdit(bool selectAll) cil managed

param.name: selectAll
param.span: 为 ，则选择单元格的全部内容；否则为 。

span.span: to select all of the cell's content; otherwise, .

summary.span: 准备当前选中的单元格以进行编辑。

span.span: Prepares the currently selected cell for editing.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法旨在准备控件和其内容以进行编辑。The purpose of this method is to prepare the control and its contents for editing. 例如，你可能想要放置插入点末尾的内容，或更改内容的对齐方式。For example, you might want to put the insertion point at the end of the contents, or change how the contents are aligned.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property RepositionEditingControlOnValueChange As Boolean
public: property bool RepositionEditingControlOnValueChange { bool get(); };

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示每当值更改时，是否需要重新定位单元格的内容。

span.span: Gets or sets a value indicating whether the cell contents need to be repositioned whenever the value changes.

value.span: 如果需要重新定位单元格内容，则为 ；否则为 。

span.span: if the contents need to be repositioned; otherwise, .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 某些情况下需要单元格内容的值更改时重新定位。Some situations require that cell contents reposition when the value changes. 例如，单元格内容可能需要重新定位单元格使文本换行和内容会变得更大时。For example, cell contents may need to reposition when a cell wraps text and the contents become larger.
